description: Returns the execution traces of all transactions included in the given block
name: starknet_traceBlockTransactions

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag
params.name: block_id

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block
BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag

result.description: The traces of all transactions in the block
result.name: traces

items.description: A single pair of transaction hash and corresponding trace

oneOf.description: the execution trace of an invoke transaction
oneOf.name: INVOKE_TXN_TRACE

execute_invocation.description: the trace of the __execute__ call or constructor call, depending on the transaction type (none for declare transactions)

revert_reason.description: the revert reason for the failed execution
revert_reason.name: revert reason

STATE_DIFF.description: The change in state applied in this block, given as a mapping of addresses to the new values and/or new contracts

items.description: The declared class hash and compiled class hash

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

class_hash.description: The hash of the declared class
class_hash.title: Class hash

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

compiled_class_hash.description: The Cairo assembly hash corresponding to the declared class
compiled_class_hash.title: Compiled class hash

items.title: New classes

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

class_hash.description: The hash of the contract code
class_hash.title: Class hash

items.description: A new contract deployed as part of the state update

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

items.description: The hash of the declared class
The updated nonce per contract address

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

nonce.description: The nonce for the given address at the end of the block
nonce.title: Nonce

items.title: Nonce update

items.description: The list of contracts whose class was replaced

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

contract_address.description: The address of the contract whose class was replaced
contract_address.title: Contract address

items.title: Replaced class

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

address.description: The contract address for which the storage changed
address.title: Address

storage_entries.description: The changes in the storage of the contract

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

key.description: The key of the changed value
key.title: Key

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

value.description: The new value applied to the given address
value.title: Value

storage_entries.title: Storage entries

items.description: The changes in the storage per contract address

state_diff.description: the state diffs induced by the transaction
state_diff.title: state_diff

oneOf.description: the execution trace of a declare transaction
oneOf.name: DECLARE_TXN_TRACE

STATE_DIFF.description: The change in state applied in this block, given as a mapping of addresses to the new values and/or new contracts
